name: Far Out (Libur)
description:
In Far Out humanity has sent out countless drones to mine distant planets uncover new element and research the universe.

One of their mining stations with a Promising new element has lost contact you are a drong sent to investigate what happend to the Mining station and recover the valueable element.

Restore as much of the facility as you can and find the element

Controls: 

- WASD to Move   

- ESC to Pause

- E to Interact

- Mouse to look around   

Credits:

Sounds: WeLoveIndies
